message.content:
I need to identify and extract the carrying amount of inventories sold (cost of goods sold) from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the line item "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period. 

From the income statement:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 3020000.00 | 2024-01-27 |

This is the value I need to extract as the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3020000.00'} }
```
